text:
Mineral Resources Development (Exemption) Order 2005

I make the following order under section 5(4) of the Mineral Resources Development Act 1995 .

22 February 2005

BRYAN GREEN

Minister for Infrastructure, Energy and Resources

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Mineral Resources Development (Exemption) Order 2005 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Land exempt from Mineral Resources Development Act 1995
    The area of land specified in Schedule 1 to this order is declared to be exempt from the Mineral Resources Development Act 1995 .

SCHEDULE 1 - Exempt Areas

All that area of land in the land district of Wellington comprising about 14 square kilometres shown hatched and bounded by a heavy black line on Plan 6624 in the Central Plan Register, a reduced copy of which is set out, by way of illustration only, in Schedule 2 to this order.

SCHEDULE 2 - Plan

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 9 March 2005

This order is administered in the Department of Infrastructure, Energy and Resources.
